gsmm.csm.analyse_csm module

gsmm.csm.analyse_csm.analyse_and_save_fluxes(model_paths: Dict[str, str] | None = None) → None[source]

Analyze fluxes from given model paths and save the results.

Parameters: - model_paths (dict, optional): Dictionary containing model names as keys and file paths as values. Defaults to None.

Returns: - None

gsmm.csm.analyse_csm.save_filtered_reaction_deletion_results(filtered_results: Dict[str, DataFrame], output_dir: str) → None[source]

Save filtered reaction deletion results to pickle files.

Parameters: - filtered_results (Dict[str, pd.DataFrame]): Dictionary mapping model names to filtered deletion results DataFrames. - output_dir (str): Directory path where to save the results.

Perform single reaction deletion for each model in models_dict and save the results.

gsmm.csm.build_csm module

gsmm.csm.build_csm.assign_reaction_confidences(model: Model, expression_data: DataFrame, gene_id_column: str, scores_column: str) → DataFrame[source]

Assign confidence levels to reactions based on associated genes.

gsmm.csm.build_csm.extract_genes(data: DataFrame, name_column: str | None, id_column: str | None) → list[source]

Extract genes from expression data based on specified columns.

gsmm.csm.build_csm.filter_model_by_genes(model: Model, genes: list) → Model[source]

Filter a COBRA model to include only reactions associated with specified genes.

gsmm.csm.build_csm.load_expression_data(data_path: str) → DataFrame[source]

Load expression data from CSV.

gsmm.csm.build_csm.main(model_path: str, data_path: str, gene_name_column: str | None, gene_id_column: str | None, scores_column: str)[source]

Main function to execute the workflow.

gsmm.csm.build_csm.normalize_expression_data(expression_data: DataFrame, scores_column: str) → DataFrame[source]

Normalize expression data and calculate confidence levels.

gsmm.csm.build_csm.optimize_model(model: Model, reaction_confidence_dict: dict) → CORDA[source]

Initialize and build CORDA model optimization.

gsmm.csm.build_csm.read_parent_model(model_path: str) → Model[source]

Load a COBRA model from SBML file.

gsmm.csm.build_csm.run_model_reconstruction(model_path: str, data_path: str, gene_name_column: str | None, gene_id_column: str, scores_column: str) → str | None[source]

Run model reconstruction using the specified paths and columns.

Parameters: - model_path (str): Path to the XML model file. - data_path (str): Path to the input data CSV file. - gene_name_column (str or None): Column name for gene names (optional). - gene_id_column (str): Column name for gene IDs. - scores_column (str): Column name for scores.

Returns: - str or None: Optimized model name if reconstruction is successful, else None.

gsmm.csm.visualisation module

gsmm.csm.visualisation.filter_and_save_results(filtered_results, file_path)[source]

Filter and save valid DataFrames to a pickle file.

gsmm.csm.visualisation.load_data(filepath: str) → DataFrame | None[source]
gsmm.csm.visualisation.plot_flux_correlation_heatmap(df_fluxes, save_path)[source]

Generate a heatmap of correlation coefficients for fluxes between different models for all reactions.

Parameters: - df_fluxes (pd.DataFrame): DataFrame with ‘Model’, ‘Reaction’, and ‘Flux’ columns. - save_path (str): Path to save the heatmap.

gsmm.csm.visualisation.plot_flux_distribution_clustermap(df_fluxes, save_path)[source]

Generate a clustermap for flux distribution across different models and reactions.

Parameters: - df_fluxes (pd.DataFrame): DataFrame with ‘Model’, ‘Reaction’, and ‘Flux’ columns. - save_path (str): Path to save the clustermap.

gsmm.csm.visualisation.plot_fluxes(flux_filepath: str | None = 'flux_data.pkl', sink_flux_filepath: str | None = 'sink_flux_data.pkl')[source]

Plot flux distributions and sink fluxes using default or provided file paths.

Parameters: - flux_filepath (str, optional): File path to flux data (default: ‘flux_data.pkl’). - sink_flux_filepath (str, optional): File path to sink flux data (default: ‘sink_flux_data.pkl’).

Returns: - None

gsmm.csm.visualisation.plot_sink_flux_correlation_heatmap(df_sink_fluxes, save_path)[source]

Generate a heatmap of correlation coefficients for sink fluxes between different models.

Parameters: - df_sink_fluxes (pd.DataFrame): DataFrame with ‘Metabolite’, ‘Flux’, ‘Context_Model’ columns. - save_path (str): Path to save the heatmap.

gsmm.csm.visualisation.plot_sink_fluxes_heatmap(df: DataFrame, output_file: str) → None[source]

Plot a heatmap for sink fluxes across different context models.

Parameters: - df (pd.DataFrame): DataFrame containing sink flux data with columns ‘Metabolite’, ‘Flux’, ‘Context_Model’. - output_file (str): Path to save the sink fluxes heatmap.
